sourcesContent: import "../../styles/components/roundchart.css" import { RadialBarChart , RadialBar , ResponsiveContainer , PolarAngleAxis } from "recharts" import { useRef } from "react" function RoundChart ({input}) { let achievement = (input.score)*100 let tab = [{score:achievement,fill:"red"}] const windowWidth = useRef(window.innerHeight) return ( Score 1024) ? "70%" : "50%"} outerRadius="100%" barSize={15} data={tab} startAngle={90} endAngle={450}> {achievement}% de votre objectif ) } export default RoundChart
